column1:    I noted that the entity had prepared a strategic plan. However, this had not been approved by the end of the year under review. The Commission did not budget to collect NTR during the year under review. However, the financial statements indicated that NTR amounting to UGX.21,850,000 was collected during the year. There was no evidence to show that the procurement method and the Evaluation Committee were approved by the Contracts Committee for six sampled procurements worth UGX48,310,800. Lack of approval contravenes the PPDA Regulations. In the circumstances, the Evaluation Committees executed the assignment without authority. 28 Health Service Commission. 2020/21 Unqualified Opinion
